<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This represents an &quot;assembler immediate&quot;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  In its most general form, this can hold &quot;:Kind:(SymbolA - SymbolB +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  imm64)&quot;.  Not all targets supports relocations of this general form, but we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  need to represent this anyway.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In general both SymbolA and SymbolB will also have a modifier</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// analogous to the top-level Kind. Current targets are not expected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to make use of both though. The choice comes down to whether</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// relocation modifiers apply to the closest symbol or the whole</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// expression.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that this class must remain a simple POD value class, because we need</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// it to live in unions etc.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcvalue/#aeeb0d3729924a0325f79f5f33c634a5b">MCValue</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
